Body:
"""
        Test that a Pie key object can be converted into a core key object.
        """
pie_key = pobjects.SymmetricKey(enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.AES, 128, self
    .symmetric_bytes)
core_key = self.factory._build_core_key(pie_key, secrets.SymmetricKey)
self.assertIsInstance(core_key, secrets.SymmetricKey)
self._test_core_key(core_key, enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.AES, 128, self.
    symmetric_bytes, enums.KeyFormatType.RAW)
